name: UVirtualTextureBuilder
doc:
Container for a UVirtualTexture2D that can be built from a FVirtualTextureBuildDesc description.
This has a simple BuildTexture() interface but we may want to extend in the future to support partial builds
or other more blueprint driven approaches for data generation.

TextureMobile: The UTexture object for Mobile rendering.
bSeparateTextureForMobile: Whether to use a separate texture for Mobile rendering. A separate texure will be built using mobile preview editor mode
EnableCookPerPlatform: Per platform overrides for cooking the virtual texture.
